abstract: Several big-name private equity firms are bidding for GMAC’s troubled residential mortgage unit, Residential Capital, Dow Jones reported.
snippet: Several big-name private equity firms are bidding for GMAC’s troubled residential mortgage unit, Residential Capital, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: Several big-name private equity firms are reportedly interested in bidding for GMAC’s troubled residential mortgage unit, Residential Capital, known as ResCap.

headline.main: Buyout Shops Said to Eye GMAC’s ResCap
